level.heading: Aggregate and individual contribution limits of exploratory committees.

level.text: Exploratory committees shall not receive aggregate contributions in excess of:
$150,000 for a Chairman of the Council exploratory committee;
$100,000 for an at-large member of the Council exploratory committee;
$50,000 for a Ward Councilmember or President of the State Board of Education exploratory committee; and
$20,000 for a member of the State Board of Education exploratory committee.
Exploratory committees shall not receive individual contributions in excess of:
$1,500 for a Chairman of the Council exploratory committee;
$1,000 for an at-large member of the Council exploratory committee;
$500 for a Ward Councilmember or President of the State Board of Education exploratory committee; and
$200 for a member of the State Board of Education exploratory committee.
